Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Tile

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Tile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Tile extends Object implements Serializable
this class represents the single tile of the game

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      this method overrides the method equals. it assumes that two tiles are equals if they have the same color; if the parameter isn't a tile, the method return false
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - object to be compared with "this"
      Returns:
      a boolean : true if the cards are equals
